sentences.en: A teacher's work is often compared to a candle.
sentences.cn: 教师的工作常被比作蜡烛.

sentences.en: After drawing the curtains, she lit a candle.
sentences.cn: 拉上窗帘后，她点燃了蜡烛。

sentences.en: He struck a light and set the candle going.
sentences.cn: 他擦了一根火柴把蜡烛点亮.

sentences.en: I blew out the candle.
sentences.cn: 我把蜡烛吹灭了。

sentences.en: Melted wax dribbled down the side of the candle.
sentences.cn: 熔化了的蜡一滴滴从蜡烛边上流下。

sentences.en: nobody in the final could hold a candle to her.
sentences.cn: 参加决赛的人中没人能比得上她。

sentences.en: Tenzin snuffed out the candle.
sentences.cn: 丹津掐灭了蜡烛。

sentences.en: The birthday candle in a season of flowers, each one is my wish. Happy birthday!
sentences.cn: 生日的烛光中摇曳一季繁花，每一支都是我的祝愿。生日快乐！

sentences.en: The bottom of the candle is fused with its holder.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛的底部和烛台熔合在一起.

sentences.en: The breeze flared the candle.
sentences.cn: 微风吹得烛光不定.

sentences.en: The candle - light flickered in the wind.
sentences.cn: 烛光在风中摇曳.

sentences.en: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.cn: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.en: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.cn: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.en: The candle grew down until only an inch was left.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛越烧越短,最后只剩下一英寸.

sentences.en: The candle guttered out when the melted wax ran down its sides.
sentences.cn: 熔化的蜡沿着蜡烛四周淌下，蜡烛就渐渐熄灭了。

sentences.en: The candle had burned right down.
sentences.cn: 这根蜡烛完全烧尽了。

sentences.en: The flame of the burning candle soon went out.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛的火焰很快就熄灭了.

sentences.en: The light from my candle threw his elongated shadow on the walls.
sentences.cn: 我的烛光将他拉长的影子投射在墙上。

sentences.en: The tramp produced a stump of candle from his deep pockets.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉从深口袋里掏出了一截蜡烛。

sentences.en: The wind blew out the candle.
sentences.cn: 风吹灭了蜡烛.

sentences.en: The wind flared the candle.
sentences.cn: 风吹得烛光闪动。

sentences.en: When the candle was only half an inch high it flickered out and the room became dark.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛只有半英寸长时，烛光忽闪忽闪地熄灭了，于是房间一片漆黑。

sentences.en: With this candle, I will light your way in darkness.
sentences.cn: 用这蜡烛，我会在黑暗中照亮你的生命。

sentences.en: With this candle, I will light your way into darkness.
